Today we'll continue our work with matching, reweighting, and regression, but in the context of real life data for Medicare Advantage.

## Objectives
- Understand MA data and describe the differences between insurers, contracts, and plans in the MA data
- Calculate an ATE or ATT using regression, matching, and weighting using MA data

## Activities 
- Continue working with the [Medicare Advantage repository](https://github.com/imccart/Medicare-Advantage)
- Estimate the effect of competition on plan pricing and premiums using MA data
